hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
hierophant:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
hierophant:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

hierophant:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
hierophant:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
hierophant:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !hierophant:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
hierophant:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !hierophant:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

hierophant:Blessing.NAME: Blessing
hierophant:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M!. NL Heal ALL enemies !M!. NL Exhaust.

hierophant:Doubloon.NAME: Doubloon
hierophant:Doubloon.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Exhaust. NL hierophant:Hoard !M!.

hierophant:DivineIntervention.NAME: Divine intervention
hierophant:DivineIntervention.DESCRIPTION: Fully heal an enemy. NL Gain !M! hierophant:Piety per HP healed.

hierophant:ConvertCurrency.NAME: Convert Currency
hierophant:ConvertCurrency.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Gain !M! [E], or !M! [E] if you exhausted a doubloon. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:RecallFunds.NAME: Recall Funds
hierophant:RecallFunds.DESCRIPTION: Return up to !M! Doubloons from your exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:Dazzle.NAME: Dazzle
hierophant:Dazzle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block for each Doubloon in your hand. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:Embezzle.NAME: Borrow
hierophant:Embezzle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL At the end of combat, return any of the !M! gold you did not spend.

hierophant:Entourage.NAME: Entourage
hierophant:Entourage.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 additional Block per !M! gold spent this turn. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Shelter.NAME: Shelter
hierophant:Shelter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL enemies gain !B! Block.

hierophant:Encroach.NAME: Encroach
hierophant:Encroach.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards if you have less block than an enemy.

hierophant:MirrorShield.NAME: Mirror Shield
hierophant:MirrorShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to an enemy's Block.
hierophant:MirrorShield.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to an enemy's Block. NL Draw a card.

hierophant:ChurchCoffers.NAME: Church Coffers
hierophant:ChurchCoffers.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL gain !M! energy. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Sermon.NAME: Sermon
hierophant:Sermon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! hierophant:Piety. NL Gain !M! additional hierophant:Piety per unique active hierophant:Vow.

hierophant:Miracle.NAME: Miracle
hierophant:Miracle.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust ALL status cards in your hand. NL Gain !M! piety per card exhausted.

hierophant:Bribe.NAME: Bribe
hierophant:Bribe.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:Flagellation.NAME: Flagellation
hierophant:Flagellation.DESCRIPTION: Add 2 Wounds to your hand. NL Gain !M! hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:PristineSoul.NAME: Pristine Soul
hierophant:PristineSoul.DESCRIPTION: Set your Block and hierophant:Piety to the highest of their values.

hierophant:Prophecy.NAME: Prophecy
hierophant:Prophecy.DESCRIPTION: Reorder your draw pile in decreasing cost order. NL Exhaust.
hierophant:Prophecy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile, then reorder it in decreasing cost order.

hierophant:Doomsaying.NAME: Doomsaying
hierophant:Doomsaying.DESCRIPTION: Discard the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Gain energy equal to the highest cost among the discarded cards.

hierophant:Prayer.NAME: Prayer
hierophant:Prayer.DESCRIPTION: Play the highest cost card among the top X cards of your draw pile.
hierophant:Prayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Play the highest cost card among the top X+1 cards of your draw pile.

hierophant:Repentance.NAME: Repentance
hierophant:Repentance.DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat. NL Exhaust
hierophant:Repentance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain hierophant:Piety equal to twice the hierophant:Piety lost this combat.

hierophant:BulkyChest.NAME: Bulky Chest
hierophant:BulkyChest.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you draw Bulky Chest, lose [E]. NL hierophant:Hoard !M!.

hierophant:Cornucopia.NAME: Cornucopia
hierophant:Cornucopia.DESCRIPTION: Add X Doubloons to your hand. NL Exhaust.
hierophant:Cornucopia.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add X upgraded Doubloons to your hand. NL Exhaust.

hierophant:Endure.NAME: Endure
hierophant:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, gain !M! hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:Levitation.NAME: Levitation
hierophant:Levitation.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:TollTheBells.NAME: Toll The Bells
hierophant:TollTheBells.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 [E]. NL Gain 2 hierophant:Enlightened. NL Shuffle 2 Dazed into your draw pile.

hierophant:Racketeering.NAME: Racketeering
hierophant:Racketeering.DESCRIPTION: Give an enemy 10 Block. Draw a card for each 5 Block on that enemy.

hierophant:VowOfPoverty.NAME: Vow Of Poverty
hierophant:VowOfPoverty.DESCRIPTION: You may not earn gold this combat. NL Gain 1 strength at the start of your turn.
hierophant:VowOfPoverty.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not earn gold this combat. NL Gain 1 strength at the start of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfSobriety.NAME: Vow Of Sobriety
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the start of your turn.
hierophant:VowOfSobriety.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not consume or earn potions this combat. NL Gain 1 dexterity at the start of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfSanctity.NAME: Vow Of Sanctity
hierophant:VowOfSanctity.DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 additional piety when dealing damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain 10 piety.
hierophant:VowOfSanctity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 3 additional piety when dealing damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain 10 piety. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfStability.NAME: Vow Of Stability
hierophant:VowOfStability.DESCRIPTION: You take double unblocked attack damage. NL At the end of your turn, double your Block.
hierophant:VowOfStability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You take double unblocked attack damage. NL At the end of your turn, double your Block. NL Innate.

hierophant:VowOfPurity.NAME: Vow Of Purity
hierophant:VowOfPurity.DESCRIPTION: You may not inflict any negative status effects. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 artifact.
hierophant:VowOfPurity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: You may not inflict any negative status effects. NL Gain 1 artifact at the start of your turn. NL Innate.

hierophant:Martyrdom.NAME: Martyrdom
hierophant:Martyrdom.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle three Wounds into your draw pile. NL Whenever you draw a Status card, gain !M! hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:Generosity.NAME: Generosity
hierophant:Generosity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Doubloon, draw an additional card. NL hierophant:Gilded.
hierophant:Generosity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you exhaust a Doubloon, draw an additional card. NL Innate. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:CursedGold.NAME: Cursed Gold
hierophant:CursedGold.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, move !M! Doubloon from the exhaust pile to the discard pile.
hierophant:CursedGold.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, move !M! Doubloons from the exhaust pile to the discard pile.

hierophant:AuricForm.NAME: Auric Form
hierophant:AuricForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, lose !M!% of your gold, then gain that much Block.

hierophant:Phylactery.NAME: Phylactery
hierophant:Phylactery.DESCRIPTION: When you would die, heal to !M!% of your max HP instead and remove this power. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:CoinFling.NAME: Coin Fling
hierophant:CoinFling.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card. Deals !D! additional damage if you discarded a Doubloon. NL hierophant:Gilded.

hierophant:HolyStrike.NAME: Holy Strike
hierophant:HolyStrike.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Piety, NL then deal !D! damage twice.

hierophant:Batter.NAME: Batter
hierophant:Batter.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If fully blocked, strike again for !D! additional damage.

hierophant:Mercenaries.NAME: Mercenaries
hierophant:Mercenaries.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage for each !M! gold lost this turn. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:SearingVirtue.NAME: Searing Virtue
hierophant:SearingVirtue.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each unique active hierophant:Vow.

hierophant:SolarFlare.NAME: Solar Flare
hierophant:SolarFlare.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:LocustPlague.NAME: Locust Plague
hierophant:LocustPlague.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy 8 times. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:WrathOfGod.NAME: Wrath Of God
hierophant:WrathOfGod.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Deals !M! damage to you. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:SealAway.NAME: Seal Away
hierophant:SealAway.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Give the enemy !M! Block.

hierophant:Smite.NAME: Smite
hierophant:Smite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 additional damage for every !M! hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:Upheaval.NAME: Upheaval
hierophant:Upheaval.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice the enemy's block. NL hierophant:Tithe.

hierophant:RodSlam.NAME: Rod Slam
hierophant:RodSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enemy loses 1 Strength.

hierophant:Punish.NAME: Punish
hierophant:Punish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! hierophant:Piety. NL Deal 2 damage four times.
hierophant:Punish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! hierophant:Piety. NL Deal 2 damage six times.

hierophant:Anathema.NAME: Anathema
hierophant:Anathema.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each enemy per unique active hierophant:Vow. NL Lose all hierophant:Vows.

hierophant:Blasphemy.NAME: Blasphemy
hierophant:Blasphemy.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to twice your hierophant:Piety. NL Lose all hierophant:Piety.

hierophant:AuricBeam.NAME: Auric Beam
hierophant:AuricBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 10% of your gold.

hierophant:DisplayOfPower.NAME: Display Of Power
hierophant:DisplayOfPower.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. Deal damage equal to !M! times its cost.
